title: PSG ordered to pay Mbappe 60m euros
subtitle: Paris St-Germain have been ordered to pay former striker Kylian Mbappe €60m (£52.5m) in unpaid salary and bonuses by a French court.
full_text: Paris St-Germain have been ordered to pay former striker Kylian Mbappe €60m (£52.5m) in unpaid salary and bonuses by a French court.
